includedAssets.title: Episode 1
includedAssets.synopsis: As suspicions grow around a police shooting, Fleming is sent undercover to investigate Sgt Danny Waldron's armed unit.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As suspicions grow around a police shooting, Fleming is sent undercover to investigate Sgt Danny Waldron's armed unit.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As suspicions grow around a police shooting, Fleming is sent undercover to investigate Sgt Danny Waldron's armed unit.

includedAssets.title: Episode 2
includedAssets.synopsis: While AC-12 launch an investigation into who shot Waldron, Arnott is forced to defend his professional conduct in court.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While AC-12 launch an investigation into who shot Waldron, Arnott is forced to defend his professional conduct in court.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While AC-12 launch an investigation into who shot Waldron, Arnott is forced to defend his professional conduct in court.

includedAssets.title: Episode 3
includedAssets.synopsis: While Fleming trails Hari Bains, Arnott investigates the dark secrets hidden in Waldron's past.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Fleming trails Hari Bains, Arnott investigates the dark secrets hidden in Waldron's past.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Fleming trails Hari Bains, Arnott investigates the dark secrets hidden in Waldron's past.

includedAssets.title: Episode 4
includedAssets.synopsis: AC-12 restart their hunt for 'The Caddy', while Denton works her way back into Arnott's life and Cottan tries to tie up loose ends.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: AC-12 restart their hunt for 'The Caddy', while Denton works her way back into Arnott's life and Cottan tries to tie up loose ends.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: AC-12 restart their hunt for 'The Caddy', while Denton works her way back into Arnott's life and Cottan tries to tie up loose ends.

includedAssets.title: Episode 5
includedAssets.synopsis: While Arnott continues to work with Denton, Pressure begins to build as Cottan attempts to discredit him within AC-12.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Arnott continues to work with Denton, Pressure begins to build as Cottan attempts to discredit him within AC-12.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Arnott continues to work with Denton, Pressure begins to build as Cottan attempts to discredit him within AC-12.

includedAssets.title: Episode 6
includedAssets.synopsis: As evidence begins to mount against Arnott, Fleming attempts to persuade Hastings to pursue a new line of inquiry.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As evidence begins to mount against Arnott, Fleming attempts to persuade Hastings to pursue a new line of inquiry.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As evidence begins to mount against Arnott, Fleming attempts to persuade Hastings to pursue a new line of inquiry.

includedAssets.title: Season 3
includedAssets.synopsis: AC-12 investigate the suspicious actions of a unit of armed police officers and their leader Sgt Danny Waldron (Daniel Mays). Third series of the BAFTA-nominated crime drama.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: AC-12 investigate a unit of armed police officers and their leader Sgt Danny Waldron (Daniel Mays). Third series of the BAFTA-nominated crime drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: AC-12 investigate the suspicious actions of a unit of armed police officers and their leader Sgt Danny Waldron (Daniel Mays). Third series of the BAFTA-nominated crime drama.

includedIn.title: Line Of Duty
includedIn.shortSynopsis: After being reassigned to internal affairs, DS Steve Arnott attempts to find the truth in a police force crippled by corruption.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: After being reassigned to internal affairs, DS Steve Arnott attempts to find the truth in a police force crippled by corruption.
